description.value:
As a standard action, you can expend 1 point of mental focus to grant yourself telekinetic power. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.3lfx1ccxo2hdqrf3]{Telekinesis}, except you donâ€™t need to concentrate on the effect to maintain it, and using any one of its effects is a standard action. This effect lasts for 1 round per occultist level you possess.

You must be at least 9th level to select this focus power.
